question: Oliver hires a luxury car from 3 PM to 11 PM. He gets 1 hour(s) free. The first paid hour is $29 and each hour after that is thrice the cost. How much did he pay?
answer:
He got it for 11-3=<<11-3=8>>8 hours
He pays for 8-1=<<8-1=7>>7 hours
The first hour cost 1*29=$<<1*29=29>>29
The other 7-1=6 hours are more expensive
They cost 29*3=$<<29*3=87>>87 per hour
So those 6 hours cost 6*87=$<<6*87=522>>522
So he pays 522+29=$<<522+29=551>>551 in total
#### 551
